Song.title: Furious
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Jeremy Riddle, Â© 2010 Mercy / Vineyard Publishing

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [F]Nothing can tear us f[Am]rom The g[F]rip of His mighty l[Am]ove We've [F]only glimpsed His vast affection Heard w[Am]hispers of His heart and passion It's p[G]ouring out
Chorus: [F] His love is deep His love is wide and it covers us [C] His love is fierce His love is strong it is furious [F] His love is sweet His love is wild And it's waking hearts [C] to life
Verse 2: The [F]Father loves and sends His S[Am]on The [F]Son lays down His life for [Am]all He l[F]avishes His love upon us He c[Am]alls us now His sons and daughters He's r[G]eaching out
Bridge: [Am] Yeah You're waking my h[G]eart to life You are waking me [F] to life With Your l[Am]ove With Your l[G]ove With Your l[F]ove
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 nothing can tear us from the grip of his mighty love weve only glimpsed his vast affection heard whispers of his heart and passion its pouring out chorus his love is deep his love is wide and it covers us his love is fierce his love is strong it is furious his love is sweet his love is wild and its waking hearts to life verse 2 the father loves and sends his son the son lays down his life for all he lavishes his love upon us he calls us now his sons and daughters hes reaching out bridge yeah youre waking my heart to life you are waking me to life with your love with your love with your love
